description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Wield the power of magnetism on a journey through a forgotten utopia in this captivating puzzle-platformer.  Utilizing magnets, attract, repel, and launch yourself through 36 levels while avoiding dangerous, robot-crunching obstacles.
description.short: Wield the power of magnetism on a journey through a forgotten utopia in this captivating puzzle-platformer.  Utilizing magnets, attract, repel, and launch yourself through 36 levels while avoiding dangerous, robot-crunching obstacles.
